Package org.blockchainnative.annotations

Annotation Type EventField

  • @Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(FIELD)
public @interface EventField
    Adds additional metadata to the fields of a class that is used as event type.

    Event fields represent the fields of classes used as the result type of methods annotated with ContractEvent.
    Each field is meant to be mapped to a corresponding field of an event declared by a smart contract.
    Depending on the underlying blockchain, events are defined differently (or not supported at all).
    If an event contains multiple values, these values are mapped to the event object either by name or index.

    Either value() or index(), but not both fields are intended to be set.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    ContractWrapperGenerator, ContractEvent

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      int index
      Specifies the index of field as defined in the event of the associated smart contract.
      java.lang.Class<? extends TypeConverter<?,?>> useTypeConverter
      Instructs to underlying provider to convert the corresponding smart contract event field value to the declared type of the field in the event object using the specified type converter.
      java.lang.String value
      Explicitly specifies the name of field as defined in the event of the associated smart contract.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        java.lang.String value
        Explicitly specifies the name of field as defined in the event of the associated smart contract.
        If no name is specified (i.e. an empty string) the name of the field to which this annotation is applied is used.
        Returns:
        name of the field in the associated smart contract event
        Default:
        ""

      • index

        int index
        Specifies the index of field as defined in the event of the associated smart contract.
        If index is set, the underlying provider will use it instead of the name to identify the corresponding field.
        A value of -1 acts as a placeholder and has no effect.
        Returns:
        index of the field in the associated smart contract event
        Default:
        -1

      • useTypeConverter

        java.lang.Class<? extends TypeConverter<?,?>> useTypeConverter
        Instructs to underlying provider to convert the corresponding smart contract event field value to the declared type of the field in the event object using the specified type converter.
        If the resulting type does not match the field's declared type, a TypeConvertException is raised.
        NoOpTypeConverter.class acts as a placeholder, meaning no special conversion is needed.
        Returns:
        type converter used to convert the field value.
        Default:
        org.blockchainnative.convert.NoOpTypeConverter.class
